:::Sharpedge/Bluestreak/Bludgeon:::

::Sharpedge smiled.  He was never a model Maximal and liked the concept of 
this group::
Sharpedge: I like the way you guys think!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------
::Bluestreak was also pretty sad about the fact that a very beutiful place 
had been destroyed.  He also had been feeling really bummed lately at all the 
events that had been happening lately. He looked at Striker and Spears.  He 
envied them.  They each had each other, yet he had nobody::
Bluestreak: While you guys were out, Ratchets been working on the Cave in at 
the Ark, so things have been accomplished.
::He had said this to cheer them up a bit, though he didnt think it would 
work::

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------
::Bludgeon flew out of the ship and ran to the others::
Bludgeon: Starscreams got Phobia, and he told me to tell you all to get 
clear, cause this'll be a BIG explosion!
